body:
- dexlib2 2.4.0
- Fixed an issue where a NoClassDefFoundError is thrown when testing an app that uses the Data Binding Library on pre-Lollipop devices. If you still get the error, you need to test your app on Android 5.0+ devices.

name: 2.0.0-alpha05
body: - Fixed an issue that a class could not be loaded with the slash-separated name via a class loader

name: 2.0.0-alpha02
body: - Changed the dex generation task to use the dex version of source files

name: 2.0.0-alpha01
body:
- Removed all deprecated classes and methods
- Changed to obtain the root package to be opened from the class name of the user-defined AndroidJUnitRunner, not the BuildConfig. *This is a breaking change.*
- Now supports for both `androidx.test:runner` and `com.android.support.test:runner`

- Final release for version 1.x
- `DexOpenerAndroidJUnitRunner` has been deprecated
- Fixes #22: Fixed a multithreading issue while generating dex

- ClassInjector 1.0.0
- dexlib2 2.2.4
- Changed license to Apache 2.0
- It now automatically detects the BuildConfig class of the target application
- Fixes #12: Fix to make cache under `files` directory if `code_cache` directory cannot be made

- Deleted ClassNameFilter which was deprecated since 0.11.0
- More friendly error message
- Excluded some packages that should not be opened
- Revert back to the version 0.10.1 behavior

- Update ClassInjector to 0.3.0
- Fixes #8: Fix to exclude all classes under the package `android.databinding`

- Update ClassInjector to 0.2.7
- Improve error message if minSdkVersion is 26 or higher (Fixes #4)

- Include ClassInjector
- Reduce library size
- Remove deprecated methods

- Fix to accept only necessary classes from the Data Binding Library
- Restrict mockable classes to the classes under the package obtained by `Context#getPackageName()`
- Always open all the classes under the package `android.databinding`, except `android.databinding.adapters`

- Added `DexOpener.Builder#openIf(ClassNameFilter)`
- Added `DexOpener#installTo(ClassLoader)`
- Deprecated `DexOpener#install(ClassLoader)`
- Fixed not to reuse one ApplicationReader instance
- Fixed not to open 'android.databinding.adapters.**` and `**.BR`
- FIxed not to keep unnecessary bytecode in memory
- Fix to add `BuiltinClassNameFilter` to the end of the filter list
- Fix that the Data Binding Library is not filtered out
- Fix link to external Javadoc sites

- Add DexOpenerAndroidJUnitRunner
- DexOpenerRunner has been deprecated. It will be deleted in version 0.9.0.

- ClassInjector 0.2.5
- Refactor DexOpener
- Add Mockito4k as a disallowed package

- Add DexOpener
- Fix not being able to find test classes in Application project
- Add ClassInjector as a disallowed package

- Change minSdkVersion to 16
- Rename from DexOpener.java to DexOpenerRunner.java
- ClassInjector 0.2.2

- Add the following packages which custom class loader should not deal with:
  - android.databinding
  - android.support
  - com.android.test
  - kotlin
